programme.sub-title: Golden State Warriors at Minnesota Timberwolves
programme.desc: The Timberwolves attempt to eliminate the Warriors as they return home for Game 5 of their West semifinal. Anthony Edwards and Julius Randle each topped 30 points as Minnesota held off Golden State for a 117-110 win, and 3-1 series lead, in Game 4.
